nodes.bodyText: Replace this Optional with a plain value plus an enum to track in which of the possible 3 states UNINITALIZED, EMPTY, PRESENT.
Invoke insert only the first time and hold the handle. The subsequent times invoke update on that handle.

commit.message:
KOGITO-892: Create Singleton DataSource

wip

tests are failing

use update when sett()ing multiple times

add drl test case, refactor

cleanup, refactor
fix api, add test case for update

afterCommit.message: fix api, add test case for update
